title: Why Didn't I Get An S?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I've been trying to get an S for so long and I really don't know why this didn't get me an S. Any help? (I was Ashe)

replies.body:
Match grade rating is based on a lot of factors, not just K/D ratio. You're essentially graded against everyone else who plays that champ in that lane/role and graded on the scale of performance from everyone on the region. If you're looking to get an S, I'd recommend watching some gameplay from some high skill players who main Ashe. This will give you an idea of what a top tier performance with her looks like.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Well, thanks for the advice but I've done way worse and gotten an S- on Ashe but how did I not get it this time. I've watched other players and I've done just as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7Lyjin0I,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-28T23:14:11.816+0000)
>
> Match grade rating is based on a lot of factors, not just K/D ratio. You're essentially graded against everyone else who plays that champ in that lane/role and graded on the scale of performance from everyone on the region. If you're looking to get an S, I'd recommend watching some gameplay from some high skill players who main Ashe. This will give you an idea of what a top tier performance with her looks like.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Would it be more accurate if we take game time into account when we're compared to everyone else who plays the champ? 

Right now, it feels harder to get good grades if the game ended rather fast.  Perhaps because we haven't accumulated enough CS or such parameters. It's disappointing when we've overwhelmingly won a game but none in the team even got an S- because we killed the nexus really quick. 

Shouldn't all of the parameters (taken into consideration) be based on rates/percentages or based according to particular time (i.e. 7, 20mins marks) in the game?
Fairly recently you guys said you would change the way supports were graded. Well I've had games where I go like 3/3/30 and I am unable to get above an S- on champs like thresh and blitz.
xD that's insane. Did u play with a friend that lv5 or some thing an go against new ppl. I mean if that's the case you shouldn't even be allowed to play with them.
I played with a full queue of friends.
I'm guessing its because of your creeper score.
I took that into count but I've had really good cs before and a good amount of kills like 18/3/10 and nothing.
